website_summaries.verdict: This vet-approved wet dog food is a great option if your pooch is allergy prone. Skin- and tummy-friendly with a taste dogs love.
pros: Formulated for dogs with digestive and dermatological issues
Most owners report a dramatic improvement in symptoms of itching and diarrhea
Contains wholesome ingredients and healthy supplements
Even picky eaters seem to enjoy the flavor and texture
Can is conveniently easy to open
Well -established and trusted pet nutrition brand
cons: Seems to work better for digestive problems than it does for skin

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review
customer_reviews.text: Update! April 22, 2020: after some time, I started reordering this food to try again. The cans arrived in great shape! No other issues. This is the only food my dog can eat without any digestive issues so I was willing to give them another chance. We recieved the package and two of the cans were open and there were tiny worms over the open cans. Also the whole package had a terrible smell. Not very happy with this. I buy from this supplier ever two months. I’m going to have to look for another supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina M. Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: You should add some water to this!!! Dog's stomachs can get trouble
customer_reviews.text: This food is a semi solid slurry that performs best IF YOU ADD WATER. I don't think it's really very safe to give them much of this without adding water. Dogs stomachs can get trouble if their food is the gulping down kind if its dry like this, their stomachs can contort like colic in a horse. Dont know what it's called but sometimes surgery can save them. Otherwise... anyway if you add water that makes it more economical anyway , especially if your dog is a bit overweight like mine.
customer_reviews.author: The Laura Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our wonderful 4 yr
customer_reviews.text: Our wonderful 4 yr. old baby boy Pom mix loved this food. But I hate to inform you that he died Nov. 29th of a rare blood disease. We miss him terribly. We gave the rest of his food to a neighbor dog who at 13 yrs old, loves the food too. She is a little pug. cjw
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Weigand

customer_reviews.title: Thank You For Notifying Us about The Recall
customer_reviews.text: I am very thankful to Amazon for reaching out to us regarding the recall on this specific food, which we’ve used for quite some time, following a very extensive GVD surgery. My senior fur baby was experiencing 2 of the related symptoms listed, for 3 days. He was scheduled to see the vet, however, after discontinuing usage for 2 days, the symptoms were gone. He is invaluable to our family and seeing him with issues he had never had, was very concerning. Especially considering he survived a twisted gut surgery 11 months ago. Thank you again.
customer_reviews.author: WS MOM

customer_reviews.title: My senior girl loves this food!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 12 year old husky who has been battling with gut issues for years. I recently switched her from Blue Buffalo to this brand and type of wet food and dry and I have had no issues with her since. We had a smooth transition from her old to the new without having to do the whole half and half mix mess. She eats this food much more frequently and enthusiastically than she ever did with any other food which makes it a five star rating for me!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole A

customer_reviews.title: It’s rotten!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a case of salmon flavor for my dog and every can was dried around the center ring and separated from the sides of the can. I wasn’t sure if it was bad until I went to post and saw the reviews and pictures. That’s when I started opening more cans to see if they were all rotten. My dog is extremely sick and I switched to this brand trying to help my 11 year old 3 lb. yorkie. This is not what I expected from a top brand dog food. Ugh
customer_reviews.author: Freckled Jewl

customer_reviews.title: I don’t mind paying the money but I need quality.
customer_reviews.text: Just opened a can to feed my dog, it looks old, it is dark around the edges and where the food settled. Also on the lid, dark spots. I purchased this food because my dog is sick I don’t want to make him worse. Very sad. I am not home so I have to feed him what I took with me, which is this food.
customer_reviews.author: Rd

customer_reviews.title: Be careful why you feed your dog ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been on this food she didn’t want to eat because she was vomiting and having diarrhea... Now I know why ...Recall😭😡
customer_reviews.author: sonia sg7777

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Sensitive Stomach and Skin
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I decided to try this. Our furbaby has a very sensitive digestive system, along with sensitive skin. We have tried so many brands..most of them she wouldn't eat at all. Our Veterinarian had some samples that we brought home and tried. Gini ate the whole can as soon as I opened it! I was thrilled when I found this on Amazon. I highly recommend it..it has really helped Gini's tummy and skin.
customer_reviews.author: Leona Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Pup eat it up!
customer_reviews.text: This was a very good product and actually what I do is I usually buy this over and over again and it’s wonderful because my dog likes it and also it’s a very good price so I buy in bulk so it’s healthy it’s great and it’s actually cheaper than the vet or going into a shop Ma this was a very good product and actually what I do is I usually buy this over and over again and it’s wonderful because my dog likes it and also it’s a very good price so I buy in bulk so it’s healthy it’s great and it’s actually cheaper than the vet
customer_reviews.author: Kim trachtenberg

customer_reviews.title: Good food but cans came caved in / badly dented.
customer_reviews.text: Love this food but the cans were severely dented. I could return them for new ones but I need the food now. I use to order from Chewy but wanted all my items to come at the same time from the same driver but not sure if it is worth it if they are gong to arrive in bad condition. Chewy is good about replacing the order for free and will not ask you to return the original order if your not satisfied with the product or the cans arrive dented or defective. I will try one more time with Amazon and then return to Chewy if it happens again. But the food is great for sensitive stomach animals.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: then from Amazon because I like having it shipped to me (very convenient)
customer_reviews.text: My dog started having stomach issues. Bought this first time at local pet store, then from Amazon because I like having it shipped to me (very convenient). My dog seems to like it and doesn't have any more stomach issues. Only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is because getting he food out of the can is a drag. Granted, the food doesn't have much water it it so it's going to be thick. But the inside of the can is rippled (part of the can design, I assume) so the food sticks more to the inside. If the inside of the can was smooth, this wouldn't be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kristof

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Sophie's sensitive tummy
customer_reviews.text: My mini schnauzer really likes this food. She had a pancreas issue when she was younger and then for many years was on a prescription bland diet due to her sensitive tummy, which was difficult to find at pet stores. I tried this based on her new vets suggestion and it did not bother her stomach. No diarrhea or vomiting. She also scarfs it down pretty quickly. I also love the subscribe and save. I have it shipped once a month and I love not having to go to a pet store only to find that they are out of stock. So frustrating when you can't just switch your dogs food at the drop of a hat.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: i AM TRYING TO ORDER ANOTHER LIKE THE LAST CASE.
customer_reviews.text: I keep trying to order the sensitive skin for older dogs in the chicken and vegetable entre - you keep saying i bought SALMON and I have never purchased the salmon - The chicken and vegetable entre is all my little dog can eat right now. She is on meds for a brain tumor (Phenobarbitol) and that is the only one her stomach will take. I got A CASE OF IT LAST MONTH. i AM ALMOST OUT AND NEED THAT PARTICULAR CANNED FOOD. sHE CAN HAVE THE "tURKEY AND VEGETABLE ENTRE SO THAT WOULD BE ALRIGHT.
customer_reviews.author: Justine Austell

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Won't Eat
customer_reviews.text: I have two, 15-year-old dogs. They've never refused any food - dog or human - except lettuce. They'll eat anything we put in front of them. Neither will eat this food. After the third refusal, I pulled out some other food, and they scarfed it down. I don't know what's up with this, but I have a LOT of cans to donate now.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive stomach remedy
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has a sensitive tummy. We started him on this when he was sick for two weeks. His coat improved and he is doing better now. He loves the food, so we are mixing this with his dry food now. He's healthy and happy and his skin and coat continue to look great!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Mc

customer_reviews.title: Gretel's Allergy's is Gone
customer_reviews.text: Her Allergy's Are Gone. My Little Gretel was always breaking out with a small red area between her rear legs and her stomach. After feeding this Hill's Science Diet Wet Dog Food, Adult, Sensitive Stomach & Skin Recipe to her after 2 weeks the Rash Was Gone. Thank You Science Diet
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M.

customer_reviews.title: The best prescription dog food
customer_reviews.text: My little dog had pancreatitis and was put on a life-long low fat diet. The vet gave us Royal Canin and she wouldn't even eat a bit of it. I returned it to the vet and searched Amazon for another option. This brand was much more reasonable in price and she loves it. I highly recommend it. It is a solid pack ground food and 1 can goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: G. MEHL

customer_reviews.title: Fat content unbelievably high
customer_reviews.text: The can label states there is like 1-2 % fat minimum so seems low in fat. What they don’t tell you is the maximum is 21% fat. Totally misleading label. I found this out by going to the website and asking. If your dog needs a low fat diet like mine does (has pancreatitis) then don’t buy this. Sadly I bought 3 cases because of what it said on the label and now I can’t use them. I will never buy from them again. Shame on Hills science diet!
customer_reviews.author: cmmerritt

customer_reviews.title: Got us through rough days
customer_reviews.text: Loved former puppy mill doggy had a stroke. Ordered to make getting meds down easier and hoped it would be okay for her tummy. Everything had been great so far including her recovery (about 2 weeks in). I am guilty of spoiling my dogs but this one totally deserves it and this dog food helped a lot, especially in the early days when she really needed to eat. Thanks Hills.
customer_reviews.author: B. Reese

customer_reviews.title: My dog seems to love it!
customer_reviews.text: After I had to have my dog's teeth removed (he became addicted to pecans from the ground, which broke many of his teeth), I had to start buying canned food. He devours this food, and growls at all the other dogs if they even come close to his dish. He licks his bowl clean. Luckily, this flavor was not part of the recall from Hill's, which scared me while all of that was going on earlier this year. His skin used to have dark stains from his eyes tearing up, but this food magically cleared that all up! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: This last delivery has something wrong with the texture.
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this brand for almost a year. My two Min Pins love it. But this last case is weird. It's like turkey rice soup. Very runny and very little meat texture. I've opened several cans and the whole case seems to have the same liquid texture. My puppies can't get satisfied on 1/3 can mixed with Science Diet dry. Hopefully it's just an anomaly with this one case.
customer_reviews.author: Swanlady3535

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this canned dog food
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this canned dog food. His veterinarian recommended it after he recovered from pancreatitis.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Finally Cleared Flaky Skin
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this formula because my dog has very dry and flaky skin, I tried so many things to help it (moisturizing shampoos and conditioners, to supplements) and nothing seemed to work. After a month of eating this mixed with the dry food of the same formula it’s completely cleared up! If you also mix wet food with dry I would recommend the turkey and rice stew because the others are solid with no gravy... makes it harder to mix.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: We have tried many dog food brands, including one the vet recommended. My dog still had allergies. So we went a traditional route. However, when my dog received an allergy shot which may have given him seizures we had to find a different way to tackle this problem. I went to the local pet store and purchased one can of this food and one of another brand. My dogs like this food so I purchased it through Amazon as it was cheaper. Within two days my dogs allergies were gone.
customer_reviews.author: AbbybearsMom

customer_reviews.title: This helped my senior dog who stopped eating
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old lab started eating again with this food after she stopped eating. I tried Blue buffalo soft food and Iams lamb soft food. The Iams sort of tempted her but this fish flavor was what she liked. Although I only got one more week with her as her health was deteriorating, I am VERY thankful this food gave my family one more week with our dog. Thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Alison Wishart

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 13 year old dog that we have given a lot of different food over the last few years due to her sensistive stomach. Until we tried science diet she would semi regularly get sick and/or just not eat for a day or so no matter what food we gave her. We have been able to give her this and their dry food now for a couple months and she has eaten much better than she has in years.
customer_reviews.author: Alie Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Have ordered this product several times. Each order has ...
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered this product several times. Each order has at least one can damaged so that the contents gave spoiled. It's not being damaged during shipment. Damaged prior to shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it; can't wait to be fed. After the food has been in the fridge, I heat for a few seconds in the microwave before feeding. Be sure that it's not too warm. My first time to buy, several cans arrived bent. Other than that I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: G J

customer_reviews.title: Something is Wrong with this batch
customer_reviews.text: Our 105-pound lab who is usually ravenous refused to eat any of the cans from our last subscription delivery. We got a few cans from Pet Smart to see if it made a difference. He leaped at it and gobbled it up. There must be something wrong with the food in this last delivery. I have already taken them out of the packaging, so I can't return them. Shame. We are usually very happy with Hill's. They'll go in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cans are always dented
customer_reviews.text: Half the cans come dented. I tried several orders and every delivery had dented cans. Today I opened a can that made a pop. It should have been under vacuum but was instead under pressure. I would not feed that to my dog. Even if the food ingredients were ok, I do not trust the condition of the cans. Cancelling my order. Not worth risking my dog’s health.
customer_reviews.author: M P

customer_reviews.title: My dog keeps this food down and likes it.
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 11 and all of a sudden developed a sensitive stomach and lost enough weight she looked very sick. The vet put on the prescription diet of this brand and she can eat that. I was pleased to find this in non prescription formula! She can eat this , keep it down , she LOVES it and it is significantly less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: MEel

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to dry dog food
customer_reviews.text: I have a German Shepherd who is pretty picky when it come to kibbles, so I add this to her dry food and she loves it a lot. This brand is also recommended by my vet. I put this on subscription, however, the second shipment came with 4-5 dented can. I don't know if it's from shipping, but I do see similiar comments in other reviews. I'm working on getting replacement for those can. It's a great product; however, I wish the product quality and packaging would be more consistent every shipment
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: happy skin, happy stomach, happy mama
customer_reviews.text: Stops the poop the vomits and the itchies in my older border collie. She loves it. I love not dealing with nervous stomach. Too bad they dont make a food to stop nervous in thunderstorms.
customer_reviews.author: chemteach21

customer_reviews.title: Same Brand His Vet Carries
customer_reviews.text: When Covid-19 caused my Min Pin's vet to close shop during lockdown, we needed to find food that was vet approved. This is the same food we get at the vet and I was relieved that I could buy a whole case. Thank you Amazon for offering much needed products during a challenging time. My dog loves this food!
customer_reviews.author: Min Pin MomTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Delivery!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food, but it is rarely in stock at my local pet stores. I can order it here and it always arrives in perfect condition within the 2 days it is promised. I have had no issues at all during the pandemic either! Highly recommend this food as well, I used to buy expensive Vet food but when I could no longer afford it, my vet recommended this food and combined with a probiotic, majorly helped my dog's digestive system.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandrea Swofford

customer_reviews.title: This made a BIG difference
customer_reviews.text: After two rounds of deworming, my poor dog’s digestion was a mess. Probiotic helped, but not enough. Then the vet’s chicken and rice recommendation slowed him a stop. Mixing this in with his kibble ( and probiotic) made the difference. We’re now at 7 or 8 weeks with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lewandowski

customer_reviews.title: If you order Salmon, expect to get Turkey
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Hill's Science Senstive Stomach Salmon for my older dogs for 2 years now. I like the way they thrive on it, and the way it is firmly packed. It is a mainstay of their diet. However, the last two times I ordered Sensitive Stomach Salmon I received Turkey instead. The second time it happened, I returned it for Salmon. Instead, Amazon sent another Turkey!! Apparently, I can't resolve the problem, and I'm stuck with 24 cans of Turkey that I don't want.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Helped & saved my old dog.
customer_reviews.text: My dog is getting old & like us in some cases things start going south. In her case she had trouble holding down her dry & canned food,so I bought the sensitive stomach & skin food & that did the trick.No more problems & she's doing fine maintaining her normal weight.It's back up to where it's supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: larcub

customer_reviews.title: No more sticky gas! Dogs feel great 👏🏻
customer_reviews.text: We all love this food!!!! My dogs have such sensitive stomachs, we went to vet and they recommend us to switch the food we we’re feeding them. We switched, and unexpectedly we noticed no more awful, stinky, I’m talking clear the room gas! 🤢 This was an unexpected perk👏🏻 are dogs have been stinky for ever, (7 and 11 years old) not only that and much more important my dogs also are happier, more energetic, playful, move easier and have lost the weight they needed!!! It is expensive food but it is improving quality and hopefully quantity of life as well ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great Product; Poor Packaging
customer_reviews.text: We use this product for our dog all of the time, and he loves it. The locale where we buy it is not the most convenient, so we thought we'd give buying it online to save us some time and money. The cans arrived QUICKLY, which I appreciate, but at least half of the cans were bent, several of them BADLY. Instead of saving me time and money, it is costing me both. I will keep buying this product for our picky, sensitive stomach dog, but not from here anymore...
customer_reviews.author: Amy J. Samonds

customer_reviews.title: Cans dented and one can was bad.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great. Much better digestion for my dog. However, most of the cans arrived dented. Made it hard to keep the plastic lid on in the fridge. Worst of all, the last can, unbeknownst to me, has partially popped open. So by time I got to it, it was moldy and smelled awful. Thought the home shipping would be better but not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. HAM

customer_reviews.title: delivery of items damaged due to rough handling
customer_reviews.text: Product quality not the problem . Delivery of item i received was miss handled causing 2 cans in packing to burst and spread food around in packaging. I know these are rough times for delivery , but i had to discard those 2 cans and wash off and examine other cans which had been crimped by force of tossing item around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Food
customer_reviews.text: Great food for sensitive stomach dogs. My German Shepard has a sensitive stomach, she eats this food without issue and has been doing well. We augment the dry with a 1/2 can of Science Diet Sensitive Stomach canned food each meal as she is a picky eater.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Food crumbles
customer_reviews.text: This is 1st order. Delivery good. No dented cans.2 Shih Tzus loved it. Vet prescribed dry. Adding this to give in am. Dry at pm. They’re not crazy for the dry. We’ll see if it stops or diminishes their scratching. UPDATE: Food crumbles. Itching continues. Not buying again
customer_reviews.author: Little Tinkerbell

customer_reviews.title: Dogs said yuk!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs can be finicky, but usually it takes a while to burn them out on a canned wet dog food. Even then they will still eat once they’re super hungry. After the first can, neither of them would touch this dog food. As another reviewer mentions, it almost seems overly dry and sandy to where you have to scrape it from the can. Well, most of mine eventually got canned! Definitely would not recommend and won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CANDICE R. BOOTHE

customer_reviews.title: Picky eater
customer_reviews.text: My dog is picky, she still prefers her old food, so I mix. Her old food was causing stomach issue. Mixing the 2 seems to help. Hoping she can ween off of her old food and start 100% on this. Not sure if she doesn’t like the flavor or if it’s because it’s something new
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Zengerski

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food. I have one who’s a picky eater and one who has a sensitive tummy and they both do really well with this food. My sensitive dog has not had any tummy upset since she’s been eating this food which is a big deal because with all other foods she’d vomit or have diarrhea often.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTIE M COCKETT

customer_reviews.title: 3 out of 12 cans were not useable
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food, but the second case I bought had three cans that wen opened they exploded with a forceful burst of air—like an amped up can of biscuits. That indicates something is wrong, so in the trash they went. EXPENSIVE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Young

customer_reviews.title: Great Food-Make sure it is correct flavor.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. However, one time it was shipped and was not the Turkey and Rice as I had ordered; it was the beef stew. I should have sent it back but thought I would try it and both of my dogs disliked that flavor.
customer_reviews.author: mrtflowers

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food and it is a substitute for a very expensive food at the vet for a dog who has had severe stomach issues. The last time I purchased, it was fine. This time the cans were beat up pretty badly causing many to be dented and 2 to be dented so badly they were actually opened and I had to throw them away for safety.
customer_reviews.author: A Love

customer_reviews.title: Hill's Science Diet Wet Dog Food, Adult, Sensitive Stomach & Skin 12-Pack
customer_reviews.text: I will NEVER buy canned dog food again from Amazon most of the cans were all dented some of the tops were buldged so didnt feel right feeding him these, so was a waste of money and could;t get a refund , not right.
customer_reviews.author: Wandakay

customer_reviews.title: dissapointed and concerned
customer_reviews.text: my dog Bailey is eating Hill's science diet both dry food and canned food for last 3 .5 years including his treats on Amazon . But recently, I noticed there is a difference in consistency of canned food and he is vomiting every day which is unusual and makes me worry. already spoke to Hill's science diet directly. I am highly disappointed and worried with recent canned food, if there is any contamination. I highly appreciate feedback and message asap. Thank you Kommisetti
customer_reviews.author: veera

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helps with digestion.
customer_reviews.text: My yorkie poo has developed serious digestive problems. I was buying Dr. Hill digestive stew for her. She loved it. She refused to eat this type until I added water and three drops of CBD, peanut butter flavor. Now she will eat it pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Scent Care

customer_reviews.title: This is the only dog food my dog eats.
customer_reviews.text: He seems to love it and sticks his nose up to anything else. My vet recommended it after my dog had stomach surgery. My dog is very important to me so giving him the best I can and what his vet recommended it important to me.
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Giles

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE RUNNY POOP
customer_reviews.text: My boxer is 10 years old. I have tried all the high end dog foods. After 2 days of eating this fabulous canned food she is back to normal. No icky smell like other dog foods. Premium product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Important for long hair coats or double-coated dogs
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our very senior long-hair-coat dog, who had a sensitive stomach and picky eater. This went on top of his kibble and enticed him to eat. A large serving spoonful, broken up on top of his kibble and if it was not there, he would give us a dirty look--where's the GOOD STUFF?! Don't run out, get it and make your very furry friends happy, as ours was.
customer_reviews.author: Think Again

customer_reviews.title: Our dog refuses to eat it!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize I was buying the salmon recipe of this formulation for dogs with a sensitive stomach. She absolutely refuses to eat it. Wish I hadn’t bought an entire case. My husband went to a local pet store and got her the chicken and turkey versions, which she likes. He said the pet store couldn’t give away the salmon—the shelves were loaded with it, while there were just a couple cans of the chicken left.
customer_reviews.author: ekmr

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm!!!
customer_reviews.text: Tried at my vets recommendation. My dog loves it he’s fifteen and runs to his bowl for meals. He had stopped eating a while back and this got him back to eating well.
customer_reviews.author: Jonnai

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful value for the money
customer_reviews.text: My dog was put on a strict diet by the veterinarian and this was a way better cost than some of the other brands that the veterinarian recommended but had the same products
customer_reviews.author: Amanda smiley

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: The turkey gives my dog the runs but the salmon and chicken she likes. I have an older dog that suffers from allergy and pancreatitis due to old age. This is the only food her stomach can take. I tried switching out the flavor but she doesnt like the turkey.
customer_reviews.author: AnythingCathleen

customer_reviews.title: Only food my dog doesn't throw up!
customer_reviews.text: My 15 yr old terrier mix was having trouble keeping food down. No matter what we fed her, within a few minutes, it would all come right back up. Found this at a local Tractor Supply and decided to try some. I'm happy to say, she hasn't thrown up at all since!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The entire case of food was bad!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this food is supposed to look like this but it's all rubbery and dry and looks old. When I took some out of the can, it literally bounced around on my kitchen table. I am extremely disappointed because my dog really loved the turkey stew and I thought the variety would be a nice change up. She leaves this nasty stuff in the bowl no matter how much water I add. I can't believe I spent money on all this old food.
customer_reviews.author: Sen Arro

customer_reviews.title: The best food my my liitle Maltipoo!
customer_reviews.text: My little fur baby has stomach sensitivities to a lot of dog food products so finding Hill's Science Diet for sensitive stomachs was a blessing! She loves all the flavors but this one is her favorite. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog is not a fan
customer_reviews.text: This product looks like sticky glop and I don't blame my dog who has digestive issues for not liking it. He prefers the pate variety from the same maker so we will be sticking with that even though it is more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for helping my dog!
customer_reviews.text: My dog started having terrible stomach inflammation, and the vets didn’t know what caused it. I switched her food to this mixed with their brand of dry food, and she became regular again. This is great!
customer_reviews.author: Rae-Ann

customer_reviews.title: Very dry, dogs are it anyway
customer_reviews.text: I think there must be an issue with how they are stored the y were VERY DRY.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Dogs loves it!
customer_reviews.text: It was recommended by my vet and all my dogs loves it! I have been noticing their skin looking better and did not cause any discomfort or runny poop. Also, it smells like tuna so not too horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Mor Mizrachi

customer_reviews.title: Mostly dented & damaged cans.
customer_reviews.text: Most every can in this case is damaged & dented. RIDICULOUS.
customer_reviews.author: franceen

customer_reviews.title: No more allergies
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time ordering this wet dog food. No regrets, great product.
customer_reviews.author: H L

customer_reviews.title: Picky
customer_reviews.text: My 17 year old dachshund is a picky eater. Due to some blood in her stool and bring put on antibiotics, the vet sent me home with 2 cans of this to try. She loved it! So I ordered more. I'm so pleased!
customer_reviews.author: FG

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My dog has all kinds of allergies and I was hesitant to buy a large quantity of food if it didn't work for him. I read the ingredients and trust the quality of Hill's Science Diet, so I went for it. He loves the taste, I mix it with dry food for him. Half the problem for my dog is his food tends to be bland. He looks forward to his meals now. Thank you Hill's for creating this product for those of us who have to be very careful what we feed our dogs.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: She loves it and no stomach issues
customer_reviews.text: My 13 yr old mini schnauzer was very finicky and it was difficult to get her to eat. From the first time I fed her this food, she has not hesitated to eat and clean her plate! I have been feeding her this for for a couple of months now and she still loves it. Thank goodness!
customer_reviews.author: Texbian

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the tummy!!
customer_reviews.text: This was FANTASTIC. My welsh corgi has a touchy stomach especially if she is anxious. We recently lost our other dog and so the corgis tummy has been touchy. This med seemed to satisfy her taste requirements and yet was easy on her belly. She never threw up after we started this. It’s Salmon so it stinks a little but we’ll worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D. Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Cans arrived semi crushed
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves the food. Either at Amazon fulfillment or driver cans are arriving crushed, hard to open.
customer_reviews.author: opinion

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive pups
customer_reviews.text: This brand is reliable and very good for dogs who may have sensitive stomaches. My mom's dog love it and this seller delivered on time in neat condition. Very happy with brand and purchase!
customer_reviews.author: lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome food!
customer_reviews.text: Both of my dogs loved this dog food! They both experience digestive issues and they are able to eat this food with no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Purdy

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Well, my dog will only eat it when he is good and hungry. But the best thing is he digest it without side affects, no more itching, etc. wish the offer came with mixed flavors. But the value is great.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Cindy & Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Dog Foods
customer_reviews.text: My dog can't digest most dog food, but does very well on this, and seems to really like it. It is a quality dog food. My dog loves it and it is one of the only foods she can digest. She has a sensitive stomach, but is doing very well on this.
customer_reviews.author: B. Griego

customer_reviews.title: Amazing change in my pup
customer_reviews.text: My pup has a very sensitive stomach and it took me months to find a way to get her regulated. When I switched her to this canned food for her breakfast it was like a miracle. She is finally feeling better and I’m so thrilled to have found this food!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive stomachs
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this food for my Wheaten Terrier who has a sensitive stomach. I mix this with his normal food when he goes on hunger strikes. He changes his mind and chows down.
customer_reviews.author: EMarie

customer_reviews.title: Quality is old
customer_reviews.text: The cans are different from the ones I buy at the pet store. I bought the salmon and vegetable flavor. My 5 year old Pom loves it. But the food seems a bit old because the sides are separated in the can. Center of the food has a giant hole as if the moisture is gone from the food.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Not sure for food allergies
customer_reviews.text: Who knows. My puppy has gotten allergy shots and is on allergy pills and was still itching and biting her skin. The vet recommended a food like this to help. My dogs have been on it a week now and I don’t see much difference. Maybe it needs more time I don’t know. Super expensive though.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Yager

customer_reviews.title: Effectively Relieved Allergic Digestive Problems
customer_reviews.text: Within days our dog’s digestive problems, including frequent bouts of diarrhea, were relieved. He loves the taste. Appears to be very complete nutritionally. Very pleased. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Steward H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for old doggo
customer_reviews.text: Had to switch my pit over to this food a while back and was surprised when I saw they had wet food. I def wanted him to keep wet food since he loves it. I’m this brand specifically is great to him. His fur coat has never been smoother
customer_reviews.author: Ana Landaverde

customer_reviews.title: The only canned food I will buy for my dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a picky eater and this is the only canned food he will eat, thanks to this brand he is putting on healthy weight and gaining energy
customer_reviews.author: dorglan

customer_reviews.title: Our sick pup loved it and was able to keep it down
customer_reviews.text: Our 15 year old border collie developed old dog syndrome as was not able to keep food down. Gave him this and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Nickel

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty add-on special diet for dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have tried this special diet on my large breed dogs and they love the taste of the special diet. I am very pleased the special needs of my dogs are being met. They have been on this diet for more than 6 months and I will continue to use this canned dog food as an add-on to their science diet dry dog food.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: Doggone Good!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves the stew. She now refuses to eat any dog food without gravy. We were giving her the salmon variety which has no gravy, now she walks away. This has made my dog a picky eater. Jury's out on whether that's good or bad.
customer_reviews.author: Coni Pursley

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love the food. I'm not happy with the delivery service. The box is usually in such bad shape the can packaging is split and some of the cans are loose and dented!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pierre's mom

customer_reviews.title: Hill's Science Diet Adult Food
customer_reviews.text: I singed up for automatic delivery but had to cancel it cause my dog didn't really like the taste. He's very picky soooo I can't blame the food. I change his food daily but I always give him Hill's Science and his hair looks beautiful!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nilda Pomar

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves the Hills
customer_reviews.text: I started feeding this to my miniature Schnauzer who will be 13 in 2019. She loves it and I’ve been using it for several years. It’s senstive for her stomach & skin. She has a tendency to have skin problems and that has cleared up. She maintains an appropiate weight, too.
customer_reviews.author: Silverfox

customer_reviews.title: Will your dog eat it??
customer_reviews.text: My dog will not eat the dog food containing chicken. Tryed 2 different types - he will eat the beef. Spoiled? Probably. Bob
customer_reviews.author: Bob & Dotti

customer_reviews.title: Healthier coat and healthier dog.
customer_reviews.text: My little Pomeranian enjoys this food and gobbles it up. He is now has a much thicker, healthier coat and has stopped his incessant scratching. He's also frisky as all heck and wants to run everywhere, not walk, run! Excellent food.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl B.

customer_reviews.title: Potentially Dangerous Contaminants
customer_reviews.text: We found hard white pellets in the food. Our dog experienced illness as a result of eating this food. The food seems to be contaminated by vitamin D or some other substance. The company offered to pay our vet bills and sent us coupons to replace the food. We did not wish to purchase any further products from this company. Our vets tell us that the Hill’s Science Diet products sold on Amazon are not the same as those sold in vet’s offices. We cannot confirm this.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lord

customer_reviews.title: Canned dog food. No offer to replace or refund
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damaged. Cans smell because the cat food that arrived were also damaged and had a rancid smell with maggots present.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells Like Metal!  Awful!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying turkey stew for years. In the beginning it was great! Recipe has been changed. Smells like metal. Dog refuses to eat. Not returnable. I have lost $100 plus. It is Awful!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie A. 7

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this order
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for years and my dog seemed to love it. However this last wooder has mold or it not happy about that
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Mulvey

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs both have VERY sensitive stomachs. I mix this with the Hills Sensitive Stomach dry food. They love it! And I feel like I'm giving them good food.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this canned food for some time now and he has perfect poop, the itching has stopped and he does ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog has a sensitive stomach, sensitive skin and a short nose. I have been using this canned food for some time now and he has perfect poop, the itching has stopped and he does not make the choking sound that dogs with small noses make. He isn't crazy about the food but I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Westie

product_meta.title: Hill's Science Diet Wet Dog Food, Adult, Sensitive Stomach & Skin, 12.8 Oz, 12-pack
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Salmon & VegetableHealthy digestion is a cornerstone of good Dog nutrition. That's why Hill's Science Diet Adult sensitive stomach & skin Salmon & Vegetable entrée helps optimize digestive health & skin health for your adult dog. Natural fibers help promote easy stool cleanup while Omega 6s and vitamin E nourish your adult dog's skin and adds luster to their coat. This is a wet food made with natural ingredients you'll want to check out. There’s more to love with the new look of science Diet. Some of our products also have new names & new formulas. Not recommended for puppies and pregnant or nursing dogs. Easy-to-digest ingredients for healthy digestion & easier stool pick-up.
feature_bullets: Wet dog Food formulated for optimal digestive and skin health
Supports healthy skin and coat with omega 6 fatty acids and vitamin E
Delightful wet food made with natural ingredients
Mix up meal time with Hill's Science Diet adult sensitive stomach and skin tender Turkey and Rice stew
Made in the USA with global ingredients you can trust

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
